setGoalScreen.howQuickly: How quickly would you like to be Mortgage free?

setGoalScreen.ercTitle: In potential breach of ERC limit
setGoalScreen.ercMessage: While most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance in a year without incurring Early Repayment Charges (ERC), please check with your lender if you are unsure

overPaymentHistory.basicInfo: Most lenders allow you to overpay up to 10% of your mortgage balance a year but do check if you’re not sure. You risk being charged early repayment fees if you pay over the permitted amount.
